column5: Anyone know how lake levels are in different areas of Canada? Did the Canadians get enough moisture last winter to bring the lake levels up?Thanks,Pooch

Low snowfall winter again north of Superior,but most smaller inland lakes have benefitted from steady spring rains and are back to near normal.(Thunder Bay-Nakina)Larger waterbodies are still low(Nipigon,Superior)but these are so big they take more than one season to bounce back.Off to a good start though.
